Description: Year for which to retrieve biomass potential according to the assumptions of the `JRC ENSPRESO <https://data.jrc.ec.europa.eu/dataset/74ed5a04-7d74-4807-9eab-b94774309d9f>`_ .
Scenario for which to retrieve biomass potential. The scenario definition can be seen in `ENSPRESO_BIOMASS <https://cidportal.jrc.ec.europa.eu/ftp/jrc-opendata/ENSPRESO/ENSPRESO_BIOMASS.xlsx>`_
The comodity that are included as solid biomass
The comodity that are not included as a biomass potential
The comodity that are included as biogas

Values: Dictionary with planning horizons as keys.
Description: Share of unsustainable biomass use retained using primary production of Eurostat data as reference

Values: Dictionary with planning horizons as keys.
Description: Share determines phase-in of ENSPRESO biomass potentials
